Program Description: $500 rebate for at least 2.8 UEW HPWH installed by contractor licensed in Arizona between July 1, 2023 and April 30, 2024
Equipment Standards Restrictions: ENERGY STAR certified HPWH that meets minimum efficiency ratings with a Uniform Energy Factor (UEF) of 2.8 or better
Other Restrictions: must be permanent SRP residential electric customer who lives in a single-family detached home, single-family attached home, mobile home or apartment/condo; not available for new construction; installed in a home that has had permanent electric service from SRP for more than one year
